Sample.Title: Angular single-page application (SPA) calling .NET Core web API using Security Groups to implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)

ManualSteps.Comment: On Azure Portal, create a security group named GroupAdmin, assign some users to it, and configure your ID and Access token to emit GroupID in your app registration.
On Azure Portal, create a security group named GroupMember, assign some users to it, and configure your ID and Access token to emit GroupID in your app registration.

Mappings.key: Enter the domain of your Azure AD tenant, e.g. 'contoso.onmicrosoft.com'
Enter the ID of your Azure AD tenant copied from the Azure portal
Enter the application ID (clientId) of the 'TodoListAPI' application copied from the Azure portal
Enter the endpoint for TodoList web API, e.g. https://localhost:44351/api/todolist
Enter the API scopes as declared in the app registration 'Expose an API' blade, e.g. api://{clientId}/access_as_user
